lead_paragraph: The Chicago Fire selected midfielder Jack Harrison from Wake Forest with the first overall pick in the M.L.S. draft, then traded him to New York City F.C.

headline.main: Chicago Fire Trade Top Pick to New York City F.C.

abstract: Chicago Fire selects Wake Forest midfielder Jack Harrison with first overall pick in MLS draft before trading him to New York City FC.
